almost-successful-bluetooth-dongle.title: Almost Successful Bluetooth Dongle
almost-successful-bluetooth-dongle.description: Notes on an almost successful attempt at connecting a newer Bluetooth dongle for my Raspberry Pi.

successful-wi-fi-dongle-connection.title: Successful Wi-Fi Dongle Connection
successful-wi-fi-dongle-connection.description: Notes on a successful attempt at connecting my Wi-Fi and Bluetooth dongles for my Raspberry Pi.

failed-dongle-connections.title: Failed Dongle Connections
failed-dongle-connections.description: Notes on failed attempts at connecting my Wi-Fi and Bluetooth dongles for my Raspberry Pi.

uncomplicated.title: Uncomplicated
uncomplicated.description: Two software packages added to the Pi, and I finished reading on of the books I have on the subject.

shared-folder.title: Shared Folder
shared-folder.description: I mounted my Raspberry Pi as a shared folder in Mac OS X and link to instructions on how to do so.

blinky-light.title: Blinky Light
blinky-light.description: Thanks to help from the Vancouver Hack Space, I got up and running with my Raspberry Pi.
